channel.title: About on Otman Benchekroun
channel.description: Recent content in About on Otman Benchekroun

item.title: Bug Board
item.description: A collection of images I saved of temporary results I’ve accumulated while working on various research projects. Not all of them contain bugs! There should have been a video here but your browser does not seem to support it.

item.title: RigRats : Exporting Blender Animation to a Huge .JSON File
item.description: For many of my projects, I require designing a rig animation in Blender. To export the animation, I’ve made use of a homemade Blender add on called RigRats

item.title: Publications
item.description: Fast Complementary Dynamics via Skinning Eigenmodes ACM Transactions on Graphics (SIGGRAPH North America), 2023 Otman Benchekroun, Jiayi Eris Zhang , Siddhartha Chaudhuri, Eitan Grinspun, Yi Zhou, Alec Jacobson Adaptive Merging for Rigid Body Simulation ACM Transactions on Graphics (SIGGRAPH North America), 2020 Eulalie Coevoet, Otman Benchekroun, Paul G. Kry,
